title: cmd/godoc: encoding/binary does not show BigEndian, LittleEndian
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. godoc -http=:6060
2. open http://localhost:6060/pkg/encoding/binary/
3. Look for BigEndian or LittleEndian

What is the expected output?
You would find the godoc for binary.BigEndian and LittleEndian

What do you see instead?
Nada.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
OS X

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
5d4cd2971008 tip

Please provide any additional information below.
